name: Stanislaw Kowalski
story: Stanislaw Kowalski served in the Polish military for twenty years before retiring and joining the INDEPENDENT faction as a Sergeant. He is a skilled marksman and prefers to operate in urban environments, where he can use his knowledge of the terrain to his advantage. Stanislaw is fiercely loyal to his comrades and will stop at nothing to protect them, even if it means putting himself in harm's way. He is married with two children and hopes to one day return home to his family.
